/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves forming a natural canopy overhead. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and trucks are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the bustling activity of daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the expansive backdrop. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
